name: BreakoutADA Website Accessibility
author: Breakout Internet Media

sections.description:
The most cost-effective way to include fully automated, ADA/WCAG 2.1 compliant web accessibility to your existing website.

No changes to your website are required.

Mitigate the risk of ADA lawsuits and increase your potential audience.

Start today for free – no credit card required.

REGISTER to activate after installing plugin.

BreakoutADA requires a subscription to continue working on your website after 30-day trial expires.

Websites with less than 100K monthly visitors pay just $50/month.

SUBSCRIBE to keep your website accessible and protected.

License

BreakoutADA plugin is free software, and is released under the terms of the GPLv2 (GNU General Public License) version 2 or (at your option) any later version. See license.txt.
